translations: n.（Diya）人名；（尼日利）迪亚；（俄）季娅

phrs.translation: 迪雅·莫扎, 最爱影星

sentences.sentence: Diya Xuan Lighting Factory is specialized in producing home decoration lamp, floor lamp, lamp business.
sentences.translation: 迪雅轩灯饰电器厂是专业生产家居装饰台灯、落地灯、灯具的企业。

sentences.sentence: Zhuji Diya Textile co., Ltd. sincerely welcome friends from all circles come to visit, study and business negotiations.
sentences.translation: 诸暨迪雅纺织有限公司热诚欢迎各界朋友前来参观、考察、洽谈业务。

sentences.sentence: Named after their daughter "DIYA" meaning the light that enlightens, this home we are certain will be loved and nurtured.
sentences.translation: 这座住宅以客户女儿“迪亚”的名字来命名，意味着这个家被阳光照亮，充满着爱与鼓励。
